Submit an R script for local execution

submit_script_local.Rd

Runs an R script locally in a separate R process, capturing output and providing a job-like interface for consistency with SLURM jobs.

Usage

submit_script_local(
  script,
  args = character(),
  name = NULL,
  env = character(),
  lib_paths = .libPaths(),
  rscript = file.path(R.home("bin"), "Rscript"),
  wd = dirname(normalizePath(script, mustWork = TRUE))
)

Arguments

script

Path to R script file to execute

args

Character vector of command line arguments

name

Job name

env

Named character vector of environment variables

lib_paths

Library paths to use

rscript

Path to Rscript executable

wd

Working directory for script execution

Value

A parade_local_job object
